channel.title: 2007 Redone
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hi guys, Feels here. I'm working on a server called "2007 Redone"
Before you say, "Wow this hasn't been done before" You'd be dead wrong. And I'll tell you why.
What we have ------ All skills working Duel Arena Minigames Custom Quests! Player owned shops! Custom items (Nothing overboard) All NPC'S All Shops Correct RS prices And, Many, Many more to come.
Images ------ Working Clanchat! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2qk7609.png[/img]
Working Duel Arena [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/wrzui8.png[/img]
Working NPC dialogue [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2zgah6o.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://07redone.forumotion.com/"]Website[/URL] ------ [URL=http://"http://tinyurl.com/ldydprk"]Webclient[/URL] (Buggy, recommend using downloadable client) ------ [URL=http://"http://up.ht/19QLDlg"]Downloadable Client[/URL] (works 100%)
This server is in PRE ALPHA (LOADS MORE CONTENT TO COME) [/CENTER]
